sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"行为，行动"之意。
means: act ：一般指具体的、短暂的或个别的行为，强调行为的完成及其效果。
action ：普通用词，着重行动的过程。
deed ：较庄重用词，除泛指各种行为外，还可用于指某种高尚或伟大的行为，故常译作"功绩，业绩"。
operation ：多指一连串行动或行为的完成方式。
performance ：主要指行动的方式方法。

sentence.Network_en: The perpetrators of this evil deed must be brought to justice.
sentence.Network_cn: 必须将参与这一恶行的凶手绳之以法。

sentence.Network_en: Smith changed his name by deed poll to Jervis-Smith.
sentence.Network_cn: 史密斯通过单边契据将自己的名字更改为杰维斯&dash1;史密斯。

sentence.Network_en: A man's deed is the touchstone of his greatness or littleness.
sentence.Network_cn: 行动是一个人伟大或者渺小的试金石.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English dēd, dǣd, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch daad and German Tat, from an Indo-European root shared by do

entry.tran: （做的）事情;作为;（尤指）事迹，功绩，劣迹
entry.def: A deed is something that is done, especially something that is very good or very bad.

example.ex: His heroic deeds were celebrated in every corner of India.
example.tran: 他的英勇事迹在印度各地广为传颂。

example.ex: ...the warm feeling one gets from doing a good deed...
example.tran: 做了好事后心头暖暖的感觉

entry.tran: 契约;证书;(尤指)地契，房契
entry.def: A deed is a document containing the terms of an agreement, especially an agreement concerning the ownership of land or a building.

example.ex: He asked if I had the deeds to his father's property.
example.tran: 他问我是否有他父亲房产的房契。

means.word_mean: 2. a legal document signed and sealed and delivered to effect a transfer of property and to show the legal right to possess it;

sentences.sentence: "he kept the title to his car in the glove compartment"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in使……+deed做,行为→使……做→成为现实

Sentence.sentence: A man who had recently reconciled with his brother told Gold there's something that lets older people to put aside bad deeds of the past and focus a little on what we need now, especially when it's sisters and brothers.

sentences.en: Deeds are better than words when people are in need of help.
sentences.cn: 当别人需要帮助时, 行动胜于语言。

sentences.en: This is the deed to John's plantation.

jushi.english: The teacher often commends good students and good deeds.
jushi.chinese: 老师常常表扬好人好事。

jushi.english: His deeds operated against the principles of freedom.
jushi.chinese: 他的行为与自由的原则相违背。

jushi.english: The heroic deeds of our 17 heroes will be remembered always.
jushi.chinese: 17勇士的英雄壮举将永远为后人所传颂。
